address.street: New Wapping Street, North Wall Quay, Dublin 1

buyer.company_id: New Wapping Street, North Wall Quay, Dublin 1

procedure.title: Provision of Information Security Resources to the Central Bank of Ireland
procedure.description: The general scope of services under the Framework Agreement is for the provision and supply of external information security resources to augment the Central Banks in-house capacity on an ad-hoc needs basis in order to deliver information security support services, projects, consultancy and other information security services., as detailed in Appendix 1A of the ITT. This is a non-exhaustive list and merely serves to illustrate the type of Services that can be procured. Full specifications and requirements, including pricing requirements, for the Services required will be set out in any future Mini-Competitions.
